data.description:
IBM Research is dedicated to technology and its societal role, seeking to innovate in computing. In this role, you will apply software engineering and computational skills to advanced chip architecture and design while analyzing complex problems.


Responsibilities

  • Investigate the feasibility of applying software engineering and computational skills towards state-of-the-art chip architecture, design, fabrication and advanced chip packaging
  • Analyze complex problems and apply creative solutions

Skills

  • Computer Science
  • Information Technology
  • Data Science
  • Physics
  • Chemistry
  • Material Science
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Bachelor's Degree
  • Prior programming, computational or data analysis experience through projects or coursework

Company Overview

  • IBM is an IT technology and consulting firm providing computer hardware, software, infrastructure, and hosting services. It was founded in 1911, and is headquartered in Armonk, New York, USA, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is http://www.ibm.com.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • IBM has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 3032 in 2025, 3301 in 2024, 2160 in 2023, 1809 in 2022, 1157 in 2021, 2669 in 2020. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
